# Summary of K2 Program GO20020

Title: Probing the Planetary Population of High-mass Stars

PI: Johnson, M. (Ohio State University)
CoIs: B. Gaudi, A. Shporer

We propose to observe a sample of main sequence A and early F stars with K2 in order to search for planets, which we will conrm using Doppler tomography and analysis of the orbital phase curve. This will expand the number of known planets in this poorly-explored region of parameter space.

# Targets requested by this program that have been observed (242)
